name: Raid and Trade
details: Ever thought you could do the job of a Norse God or Goddess and run your very own Viking settlement? Well now you can in Horrible Histories Raid and Trade game.That’s what Vikings did you see? Raid and then trade!

name: Formula-E
details: Intense, competitive, unpredictable and mega dramatic... this is Formula E! It's time to get creative and customise your own Formula E car. Think cool, think edgy and most of all think FAST!

name: Can you kick it?
details: How far Can You Kick It? Hit the ball through as many hoops as you can and try to land on the centre of each target to get the perfect score! The longer you play, the more points you earn which you can trade in to upgrade your football! Watch out for the obstacles and make sure you don’t miss the targets or you’ll get a red card!

name: Pizza the Action
details: Join Shaun and the Flock for an adventure full of mischief and mayhem!

name: Galaxy Star
details: Nova Jones has gone through a time warp and lost all her followers on Spaceagram, oh no!

name: Doctor Who
details: It is especially important now for kids to connect in safe online space when they are more isolated from each other than ever. Nightfall is here to the help!
